name: MyEmotionPotion
0:
”Alexa, open my emotion potion”
”Alexa, start my emotion potion”
”Alexa, launch my emotion potion”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my emotion potion
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to my lab! This skill will serve you a "potion" in the form quotes and bible verses based on the emotion you are experiencing. It sounds too simple to be useful, but sometimes it's just a different perspective, or the right combination of words that can help us survive our darkest days. 

Currently, you can choose from these six emotions:

Anger
Sadness
Anxiety
Bitterness
Envy 
Fear

Most of the quotes are from people whose names you might recognize. You can choose to hear Bible verses from either the King James Bible or the easier to understand, New Living Translation.

At any time during the skill you can say, "ALEXA, CHANGE EMOTION", to choose a different emotion, or simply say, "CHANGE EMOTION", while Alexa is listening for a response.

At any time during the skill you can say, "ALEXA, RESET", to change your name or simply, "RESET", while Alexa is listening for a response.

At any time during the skill you can say, "ALEXA, START OVER", to start from the beginning or simply, "START OVER", while Alexa is listening for a response.

Please send your feedback to myemotionpotion@outlook.com

Thank you!
